title: FPS problems ONLY in mid-late game? Help please?
body: Anyone know what could be causing this? Some games, my frame rate starts to go to about 20 around mid game and usually tanks to <10 late game. Anyone know what could be causing this? It almost always progresses as the game goes on, and I don't know why. Sometimes it's fine, other times it makes the game unplayable. I have graphics on absolutely lowest settings despite the fact that some games I can run it on medium-high settings absolutely fine, and the fps problems persist. Can anybody point me somewhere?

replies.body: i have no idea the game work perfectly before Riot update new client, it mess up everything. i don't understand why server is not working fine but they didn't fix it from patch 6.23 until now
Side note (similar but probably unrelated) the new client is laggy as balls for me while the old one was fine.
